description: Every very first layer should provide all-day next-to-skin comfort. That’s why they've created the Men’s Merino 150 Plant-Based Dye Boxer Brief, which not only offers softness and temperature regulation but also moisture management and odor resistance, to keep that fresh, just-showered feel going. No matter whether you’re spending the day at work or a couple hours at the gym, these boxer briefs will help you stay confident and comfy.
name: Smartwool Merino (150) Plant-Based Dye Boxer Brief - Mens
